backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing an in‑memory product map with CRUD operations, search, sorting, and sample seeding.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented PWA, service worker, install flow, and TWA guide features to their source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten one‑sentence summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/docs/PLAY_STORE_TWA_GUIDE.md: Step‑by‑step guide explaining how to package the PWA as a Trusted Web Activity and publish it to Google Play.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with PWA meta tags, manifest link, icons, and script loader for the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web app manifest defining PWA metadata, icons, theme colors, and shortcuts.
frontend/public/offline.html: Styled offline fallback page shown when the user loses network connectivity.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, cache cleanup, and a network‑first fetch strategy with offline fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack router with routes for home, products, product details, and admin, and registers the service worker.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminProdu: Wraps the admin product form in a modal dialog for creating or editing products.
Provides a form for creating or editing products, handling validation, image uploads, and submission mutations.
Displays a table of products with actions for editing, deleting, and toggling stock status.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product card with image, price, category, stock status, and navigation to the product details page.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallPrompt: Handles PWA install prompt logic, showing install UI when available and fallback instructions otherwise.
frontend/src/components/StoreFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, quick links, and a copyright message.
frontend/src/components/StoreHeader.tsx: Renders the site header with navigation, logo, PWA prompt, mobile menu, and optional admin link based on authentication.
frontend/src/components/StoreLayout.tsx: Defines the main page layout with header, outlet content area, and footer.
frontend/src/config/appConfig.ts: Defines the app slug and static application metadata including name and tagline.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and utilities for managing Internet Identity authentication and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Provides product CRUD hooks using the backend actor and react-query, including fetching, seeding, creating, updating, deleting, and toggling stock.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for themes, including light and dark mode tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin interface that requires authentication to view and manage products, including creating and editing through dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing a hero section, features, and a preview of featured products leveraging product data.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Renders a detailed view for a single product, handling loading, errors, not‑found states, and displaying product info with badges and images. Uses routing, product lookup, and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays the full product catalog with search, sorting, filtering, and loading/error handling. Renders product cards in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on window load and logs update events or failures. Handles update detection via the registration’s updatefound event.
frontend/src/utils/imageToDataUrl.ts: Converts an image File into a base64 Data URL using FileReader with error handling. Returns a Promise that resolves to the string result.
frontend/src/utils/toUserMessage.ts: Transforms unknown error values into a readable user‑friendly message string. Handles strings, Error objects, and generic objects with a message field.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom fonts, colors, animations, container settings, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animation utilities.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s state, features, and new requests related to PWA support and Android APK/Play Store packaging via TWA. Includes metadata, requirements, and image asset needs.
